tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_medication_tracking (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  medication_name VARCHAR(100),
  medication_dosage VARCHAR(50),
  medication_schedule TIMESTAMP,
  medication_taken BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Patient (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  condition VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Medication (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  dosage VARCHAR(50),
  frequency VARCHAR(50),
  patient_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE Reminder (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  reminder_time TIMESTAMP,
  description VARCHAR(255),
  patient_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    patient_age INT,
    patient_gender CHAR(1),
    heart_condition TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Medications (
    medication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    medication_dosage TEXT,
    medication_frequency INT,
    medication_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
              patient_name VARCHAR,
              age INT,
              gender VARCHAR,
              cardiac_condition BOOLEAN)

CREATE TABLE medications (medication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
                 medication_name VARCHAR,
                 dosage FLOAT,
                 frequency INT,
                 patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id))

CREATE TABLE reminders (reminder_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
                 reminder_time TIMESTAMP,
                 reminder_message VARCHAR,
                 patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id))

CREATE TABLE medication_logs (log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
                   medication_id UUID REFERENCES medications(medication_id),
                   patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
                   log_date TIMESTAMP,
                   dosage_taken FLOAT,
                   adherence_rating INT)

CREATE TABLE nurses (nurse_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
              nurse_name VARCHAR,
              specialty VARCHAR,
              assigned_patients INT[])
